name: Inch by Inch
description: You play a shrinking scientist in a race against time: Can you find all necessary formulas and ingredients to produce the antidote and stop shrinking, before you are too small to operate the life-saving lab equipment?
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5 Graphics: Nvidia GTX570 DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 400 MB available space
